121333.content: How does he become female?
121333.title: Strange Soda/Magic Comic Book?

1213332.content:
During a hot summer’s day in Megakat City, A burly yellow tabby with brown stripes exited a convenience store, holding a couple bags of microwavable burritos, sandwiches and cold soda. It was his turn to get lunch for their meal break back at the scrapyard.

While walking to his truck, he decided to stop by Pop’s Stand that was just in the middle of the street for a quick read of comics. He approached the stand to see an old gray tom manning it while reading the newspaper.

“Hey Pops!”

“Hiya, Chance! Lunch duty today, eh?”

“Yup, just checking on any new issues of Catillac and Tail Tussle.”

“Haven’t gotten those yet, but I do have gotten something new that might interest you.” he said as he went under the counter and brought out a box labeled Purlin’s Magic Panels with a wizard’s hat and wand with sparkles decorating the company’s name.
“These just came in earlier this week, just didn’t have room to display them until recent. They recently popped up in the market too.”
He used a box cutter to open the top and revealed the contents, then spreading them on the counter. Comics galore from superheroes to fantasy to sci-fi to more genres were laid out in plastic sleeves.

“With them in plastic sleeves, you can’t take them and read them for free you know.” Pops said.

“Yeah, yeah, I know.” Chance grumbled. Though there were many interesting options to choose from and he can afford at least one for just $3.99.

What kind/genre of comic book did he get?
1213332.title: Purlin's Magic Panels

12133321.content: What's the title of the comic book?
12133321.title: Superhero comic

121333213.content: What's the title of the comic book?
121333213.title: Night Prowler?

12133322.content: What's the title of the comic book?
12133322.title: Sci-Fi Adventure

121333223.content: What's the title of the comic book?
121333223.title: Planet of the Pussies?

1213332232.content: What's the title of the comic book?
1213332232.title: Mollies on Mars?

12133323.content: What kind/genre of comic book did he get?
12133323.title: Other

121333231.content: What's the title of the comic book?
121333231.title: Fantasy

1213332312.content:
While looking over the comics, one caught his attention entitled Castle Tails. The cover showed an extravagant white stone castle with banners and flags with guardsmen on the walls and towers.

Chance opted for that one and paid Pops the money. After crossing the street, he hopped into his white pick up, setting the lunch on the floor of the passenger side. He then plopped the comic book down on the seat next to him. But then again thought that taking a peek into it for a few minutes wouldn't hurt. He took the comic out of the package but as he began to open it, something strange happened. After opening the cover page, automatically the pages began to flip wildly and a bright light began to emit from it.

Startled and shock, Chance tried to escape but it was too late as he felt himself getting sucked in and fully engulfed by the light. And then he blacked out.

When he comes to, where is he?
1213332312.title: Castle Tails

12133323121.content: In what part of a castle?
12133323121.title: In a castle

121333231212.content:
"Mmm...Huh...? Kats alive.... Where am I?"

When Chance came to, he saw himself sitting in some giant stone room with large lit candle chandeliers and red, blue, and yellow patterned banners with coat of arms printed on them were hung on the wall with mounted crossed spears.

He was seated at a large decorative table that could seat thirty people in large chairs with comfy red cushions. Two larger chairs were located at both ends of the table. He looked down to see a wide spread of food from end to end on gold and silver platters and bowls of fruit containing apples, grapes, cherries etc. There were plenty of cooked meat from ham, roast turkey, chicken, fish, and then some. Some deserts such as pies and tarts with fruit fillings, apples, peaches, blueberries, etc. Baskets of rolls and breads with bowls lied next to cooked casseroles and stews with mixed veggies of carrots, peas, and potatoes. Silver goblets held drinks from milk to wine as well. It was a feast fit for a king.

He wanted to get up and leave to see anyway he can get back, but a grumbling stomach disagreed with him since he haven't eaten lunch yet.

"Maybe a bite won't hurt."

What did he eat?
121333231212.title: The dining room

121333231213.content: In what part of a castle?
121333231213.title: Other

12133323123.content: When he comes to, where is he?

121333231321.content:
While looking over the comics, one caught his attention entitled Pyramids of Purrsia. The cover showed a desert landscape with high rising dunes and pyramids with a beefy bronze colored tom donning Egyptian warrior clothing with a white head covering and white skirt wielding a scimitar in a strong pose.

Chance opted for that one and paid Pops the money. After crossing the street, he hopped into his white pick up, setting the lunch on the floor of the passenger side. He then plopped the comic book down on the seat next to him. But then again thought that taking a peek into it for a few minutes wouldn't hurt. He took the comic out of the package but as he began to open it, something strange happened. After opening the cover page, automatically the pages began to flip wildly and a bright light began to emit from it.

Startled and shock, Chance tried to escape but it was too late as he felt himself getting sucked in and fully engulfed by the light. And then he blacked out.

When he comes to, where is he?

1213333.title: Virus/Beach TG?

12133332.content:
On Anakata Island during its resort's peak season, the crowded beach laid perpendicular onto the mainland of Megakat City. Behind the shoreline were the scattered vendors that sold from food and drinks to souvenirs and the shower and bathroom stalls with the over 100 foot resort spa hotel overlooking the beach. A lush tropical forest stretched behind that covered much of the base of the island's inactive volcano.

A burly yellow brown striped tabby tom was dressed in a red muscle shirt and matching swim trunks and blue sandals. He managed to find a nicely spaced out spot to set down a large blue and white striped towel and putting up a blue umbrella.

Chance T. Furlong, AKA T-Bone of the Swat Kats, looked around the beach, taking in the view and smelling the sea salt air. The tom needed a break from the salvage yard and that no threats to the city had came up in quite some time now. Such a shame that Jake didn't come with him since he still had to work at the salvage yard and do maintenance on the jets.

After taking it all in, he decided to...
12133332.title: Beach TG

121333322.content:
He opted to take a small walk along the beach before going out for a swim.

As he walked, he took in the scenery around him, the clear sunny blue skies with gulls soaring, toms and mollies laying down on the sand, playing rounds of volleyball, surfing and swimming, and kittens digging in the sand. Such a peaceful scene.

After a while, he saw something glint in the sand from the sunlight. He went up to the spot and dug something up.

What was it?
121333322.title: Sandy Stroll

choices: Explore the forest near the volcano
121333323.content: After taking it all in, he decided to...
121333323.title: Other

1213333231.content:
He decided to cool off and take a shower first before getting into the water. After a sandy trek towards the white brick shower/bathroom building, he stepped inside, realizing that it was vacant with only him an the furnishings.

Low hanging ceiling lights dimly lit the room, revealing a wet sand covered brown tiled floor. On the left, a rectangular mirror stretched along the white wall over a bunch of sinks. Opposite side, a couple of urinals, two toilet stalls and four shower stalls, each having a white curtain for privacy.

He went into the second stall from the toilets and went inside, closing the curtain behind him. But it wasn't long until he discovered something inside it.

What did he find?
1213333231.title: Strange Shower Stuff

121333323112.content: What color is the bikini?
121333323112.title: Two piece

12133332312.content: What color was the bottle?
12133332312.title: A bottle of shampoo

121333323121.content:
"Eh what's this?"

On the ground beneath the stainless steel shower head, there lied a purple shampoo bottle. Curiously, he went over to it, picked it up and examined it.

"Purrt: Lovely Lather Lavender" the label read.

Odd that someone would leave this here, then again people forget things in stalls aren't too uncommon. He flipped the cap and smelled the sweet flowery aroma that came from it.

"Oh why not?" he said as he turned on the warm water. He squeezed the bottle of creamy white liquid into his hands and lathered and rubbed it into his scalp. "Heh, kinda tingles a bit...puuuuurrrrrr~"

The tingling sensation increased and coursed throughout his body, making him and moan and purr more and louder.

What happens next?
121333323121.title: Purple

choices: He goes into the water to swim
1213333231212.content:
After finishing up his shower, he shook much of the water off to dry himself yet still felt kinda tingly.

"Aahh...that shower felt amazing!" he said while scratching his chest which bothered him a bit, unbeknownst that his nipples were more visible as they poked out of his fur with the areolaes the size of half dollars. He also had to tightened the knot of his swim trunks because it felt a bit loose around the waist which seemed to had shrunk too.

What happens next?
1213333231212.title: Nothing happens yet (gradual)

info.brief_description: Transform the characters of Swat Kats in a multitude of ways

Transform and change the characters of Swat Kats from TG to Macro to Genital Growth.

1. Any kind of transformation is allowed except for watersports and scat.
2. No killing characters.
3. Sex is allowed but no gay/lesbians.
4. Have fun.
